snippet.title: Amber Heard donates ALL $7 million of her divorce settlement from Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
She meant it! Amber Heard donates ALL $7 million of her divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to help battered women and sick children
Amber Heard is giving away every penny from the $7 million divorce settlement she got from Johnny Depp to charities that help battered women and sick children.
Heard, 30, revealed she is donating the money to both the American Civil Liberties Union and the Children's Hospital of Los Angeles, where she says she has worked as a volunteer for 10 years.
The money will be divided equally between the two charities.  
'Money played no role for me personally and never has, except to the extent that I could donate it to charity and hopefully help those less able to defend themselves,' Heard said about the bitter divorce battle with her famous ex-husband.

Amber Heard is giving away every penny from the $7 million divorce settlement she got from Johnny Depp to charities that help battered women and sick children 
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard reached a settlement in their divorce on Monday
 In a joint statement released exclusively to Daily Mail Online the couple described their relationship as 'passionate' and at times 'volatile'
Heard (pictured before her deposition on Saturday) told TMZ she is donating the money to both the American Civil Liberties Union and the Children's Hospital of Los Angeles
The couple, who wed in February 2015, settled their divorce on Tuesday, just one day before a court hearing for the temporary restraining order Heard had been granted in May.
Heard withdrew her allegations that Depp had been physically abusive toward her and the couple released a joint statement exclusively to Daily Mail Online.  
The statement read: 'Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have agreed to resolve their divorce proceedings privately.'
'They are issuing this joint statement: "Our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love."'
'Neither party has lied nor made false accusations for financial gain. There was never any intent of physical or emotional harm.
'Amber wishes the best for Johnny in the future. Amber will be donating financial proceeds from the divorce to a charity.'
Heard, who had shown up in court with bruises on her face in May, told TMZ Thursday that she hoped her decision to donate her settlement would result 'in a positive change in the lives of people who need it the most.'
The Magic Mike XXL star also revealed to the website that she will not be collecting any residuals from the films Depp made during their 15-month marriage, even though she would have been entitled to the profits because she was not made to sign a prenuptial agreement.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Friend Doug Stanhope Speaks Out About His Controversial Amber Heard Essay, Claims Depp
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp's friend Doug Stanhope is speaking out about the highly publicized essay he wrote accusing Amber Heard of blackmailing the actor -- and Heard's subsequent defamation suit against him. 

The comedian appeared on The Howard Stern Show Monday to promote his new book Digging Up Mother: A Love Story, but a portion of his interview with Stern focused on Stanhope's essay in defense of his friend, Depp, who the comedian wrote was "used, manipulated, set up," by Heard.

snippet.title: A Look Back at Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's Sweetest Moments
snippet.description: There's been a mysterious air around Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's relationship since they were first linked in 2012 — even Amber's quotes about their marriage are slightly cryptic — but one thing is clear: these two had some insane chemistry. Even before they tied the knot in a secret ceremony in February 2015, Johnny and Amber were showing sexy PDA and bringing the heat at public events. Unfortunately, news broke on Wednesday that Amber reportedly filed for divorce from Johnny and while details are scarce, sources say the actress cited irreconcilable differences in her petition. Look back at their sweetest moments together, then take a look at all the couples who have already called it quits this year.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Pushes Back Court Appearance To Testify Against Johnny Depp!
snippet.description:
Amber Heard was scheduled to testify against Johnny Depp in their ongoing divorce, but delayed her deposition due to an “emergency.”
According to court documents, the actress was scheduled to be deposed on August 12, but failed to book a flight to Los Angeles from London, where she is filming Justice League.
Her attorneys said, “To no fault of her own, Amber was unable to arrange for a flight to travel” and requested to reschedule the deposition for the following day.

What do you think of their divorce battle? Watch the video above and don’t forget to subscribe to our YouTube Channel!

snippet.title: Amber Heard witnesses 'say Johnny Depp was 20 FEET away when star told him to stop hitting her
snippet.description:
Amber Heard witnesses 'say Johnny Depp was 20 FEET away when star told him to stop hitting her

Amber Heard witnesses 'say Johnny Depp was 20 FEET away when star told him to stop hitting her

info

 Amber Heard shouted "stop hitting me" during her row with Johnny Depp - but witnesses have claimed he was more than 20 feet away.

The actress - who was granted a restraining order after accusing Depp of physically assaulting her before she filed for divorce - shouted out, but her version of events is reportedly being called into question by two security guards.

According to TMZ, the guards were in the entryway of the couple's apartment to give them space during the argument, and heard her scream out.

The report adds that the pair went into the living area "within a second", to see Heard on the couch and Depp at least 20 feet away in the kitchen.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Daughter Speaks Out
snippet.description:
Last week actress Amber Heard filed for divorce from husband Johnny Depp. After filing the papers Heard was given a temporary restrainer order against Johnny Depp, citing domestic violence as the reason for it. In response to the allegations the 52-year-old's daughter, actress and model Lily-Rose Depp, posted a old picture of holding her as a toddler. Lily-Rose captioned the photo "My dad is the sweetest most loving person I know, he's been nothing but a wonderful father to my little brother and I, and everyone who knows him would say the same."
http://www.eonline.com/news/768735/johnny-depp-steps-out-after-lily-rose-depp-and-vanessa-paradis-publicly-defend-actor?cmpid=rss-000000-rssfeed-365-topstories&utm_source=eonline&utm_medium=rssfeeds&utm_campaign=rss_topstories
http://www.wochit.com

snippet.title: Watch Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's Strange Apology for Dog-Smuggling
snippet.description: Amber Heard was joined by husband Johnny Depp to record an extremely awkward video apology ahead of Heard's court appearance for illegally importing her dogs to Australia. The Hollywood couple submitted the video on Monday before Heard, 29, entered a guilty plea to providing a false immigration document. "Australia is a wonderful island with a treasure trove of unique animals, plants and people," Heard said in the video with Depp at her side. #InsideEdition
snippet.tags: ['inside_edition', 'Weird', 'importing', 'johnny depp']

snippet.title: Amber Heard : Ses 15 apparitions envoûtantes !
snippet.description:
Abonnez vous !
 https://goo.gl/J38CUh 

C’est confirmé, Amber Heard a demandé le divorce à Johnny Depp. Mariés depuis quinze mois seulement, la jolie blonde claque finalement la porte. Une raison pour revenir sur les quinze plus belles apparitions d’Amber Heard ! Amber Heard est l’une des plus belles femmes à Hollywood et chacune de ses apparitions fait l’effet d’une bombe. Sur le red carpet, elle sait y faire pour mettre en valeur sa sensualité en optant pour des tenues toujours très affriolantes. A 30 ans, l’actrice de 3 Days to Kill maîtrise la séduction à la perfection. Bref, elle ne manque jamais l’occasion de faire monter la température. En plus de faire tourner la tête de la planète people, Amber Heard a réussi à attirer dans ses filets le très sexy Johnny Depp. Mais alors qu’on pensait qu’ils filaient le parfait amour, la belle lui demande le divorce
. Une nouvelle qui en a surpris plus d’un et qui promet de faire couler beaucoup d’encre… EV

snippet.title: Amber Heard's lawyer responds to blackmail accusations
snippet.description:
There have been a lot of rumors about Johnny Depp's sudden divorce from actress Amber Heard. On Sunday, comedian Doug Stanhope wrote a piece in The Wrap claiming that Heard was making demands of her estranged husband, saying that she would spread terrible lies about the Pirates of the Caribbean actor if he did not meet her demands. But now Ms. Heard's lawyer is stepping up to say that Stanhope's comments are completely false, and that they consider the piece to be defamation against the actress. In addition, Amber Heard was recently granted a domestic violence restraining order against Johnny Depp in Los Angeles court.

►Circle us on Google + http://goo.gl/TXeBfX
►Subscribe Channel http://goo.gl/mqt0wI

snippet.title: The Adderall Diaries Featurette - The Choking Scene (2016) - James Franco Movie
snippet.description:
Starring: James Franco, Amber Heard and Ed Harris
The Adderall Diaries Featurette - The Choking Scene (2016) - James Franco Movie

Subscribe to COMING SOON: http://bit.ly/H2vZUn
Subscribe to TRAILERS: http://bit.ly/sxaw6h
Like us on FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/1QyRMsE
Follow us on TWITTER: http://bit.ly/1ghOWmt

As a writer stymied by past success, writers block, substance abuse, relationship problems and a serious set of father issues, Elliott's cracked-out chronicle of a bizarre murder trial amounts to less than the sum of its parts. Not long into the 2007 trial of programmer Hans Reiser, accused of murdering his wife, the defendant's friend Sean Sturgeon obliquely confessed to several murders (though not the murder of Reiser's wife). Elliott, caught up in the film-ready twist and his tenuous connection to Sturgeon (they share a BDSM social circle), makes a gonzo record of the proceedings. The result is a scattered, self-indulgent romp through the mind of a depressive narcissist obsessed with his insecurities and childhood traumas.

Some of the best movie moments happen behind the scenes. Subscribe to the Fandango MOVIECLIPS Extras channel and get the latest behind the scenes footage, bloopers, music videos, and DVD extras. We don't just watch a movie, we watch the before and after and in-between too!

snippet.title: Exclu Vidéo : Amber Heard et James Franco très complices sur le red carpet...
snippet.description:
Abonnez vous !
 https://goo.gl/J38CUh 

Hier soir avait lieu l'avant première du film The Adderall Diaries à Los Angeles. Tous les acteurs du film se sont donnés rendez-vous pour un photocall plutôt sexy...Pour honorer le célèbre red carpet Amber Heard est venue vêtue d'une robe rouge qui lui va à merveille. A ses côtés le beau James Franco qui ne s'est pas fait prié pour prendre la pose aux côtés de l'égérie Gucci. Sourire ravageur, l'acteur devenu célèbre grâce à son rôle dans Spider-Man nous a donné une belle leçon de classe. Celle qui a déjà piqué le chéri de Vanessa Paradis serait-elle sur une nouvelle proie ? La jolie blonde a en tout cas beaucoup d'atout...Tous le deux sont à l'affiche de The Adderall Diaries l'adaptation du livre de Stephan Elliot. Un film à la fois sombre dans lequel l'auteur raconte son histoire de toxicomane et sa vision de la vie. Découvrez tous les acteurs sur le red carpet en regardant la vidéo !

snippet.title: BEYOND LIES Bande Annonce (James Franco, Amber Heard - Thriller, 2016)
snippet.description:
En manque d’inspiration pour son prochain roman, un écrivain s’intéresse de près au procès d’un meurtrier...
★ Les MEILLEURS Thrillers ICI ► https://goo.gl/Iow5yO
★ Abonne-toi à la chaine Youtube ► https://goo.gl/zqsTO4

En manque d’inspiration pour son prochain roman, Stephen Elliott s’intéresse de près au procès d’un meurtrier, dont il remet en cause la culpabilité. Il décide de mener sa propre enquête, au risque de faire ressurgir son passé sur lequel il avait pourtant tiré un trait. Son obsession pour la vérité dépasse rapidement l’enquête et le confronte à ses propres doutes, sur son père notamment qui l’a abandonné et qu’il n’a jamais pardonné.

BEYOND LIES Bande Annonce
Un film réalisé par Pamela Romanowsky 
Avec James Franco, Christian Slater, Amber Heard
Date de sortie au cinéma en France : 7 septembre 2016 en VOD
Genre : Drame, Action, Thriller

BEYOND LIES Bande Annonce
© 2016 - FPE

Abonnez-vous dès maintenant pour ne pas rater la bande annonce VF ou VOST du moment ainsi l'extrait vidéo ou scène des films français et internationaux à l'affiche.

snippet.localized.title: BEYOND LIES Bande Annonce (James Franco, Amber Heard - Thriller, 2016)
snippet.localized.description:
En manque d’inspiration pour son prochain roman, un écrivain s’intéresse de près au procès d’un meurtrier...
★ Les MEILLEURS Thrillers ICI ► https://goo.gl/Iow5yO
★ Abonne-toi à la chaine Youtube ► https://goo.gl/zqsTO4

En manque d’inspiration pour son prochain roman, Stephen Elliott s’intéresse de près au procès d’un meurtrier, dont il remet en cause la culpabilité. Il décide de mener sa propre enquête, au risque de faire ressurgir son passé sur lequel il avait pourtant tiré un trait. Son obsession pour la vérité dépasse rapidement l’enquête et le confronte à ses propres doutes, sur son père notamment qui l’a abandonné et qu’il n’a jamais pardonné.

BEYOND LIES Bande Annonce
Un film réalisé par Pamela Romanowsky 
Avec James Franco, Christian Slater, Amber Heard
Date de sortie au cinéma en France : 7 septembre 2016 en VOD
Genre : Drame, Action, Thriller

snippet.title: Amber Heard Shares Photo of Bruised Face, Claims Johnny Depp Tried to Pay Her Off
snippet.description:
Amber Heard claims to be the victim of domestic violence with her husband Johnny Depp and now a photo of her bruised face has been released.

TMZ obtained the picture showing the 30-year-old actress with a large bruise around her eye.

Amber says that Johnny struck her on Saturday night (May 21) and the photo was taken shortly after the alleged incident. She claims that her husband offered her money if she stayed silent, but she decided to file for divorce instead.
In the divorce documents, Amber cited the split as May 22.

snippet.title: Witnesses claim Amber Heard had no facial bruising days after alleged Johnny Depp attack
snippet.description:
Witnesses claim Amber Heard had no facial bruising days after alleged Johnny Depp attack 

info

 Two witnesses claim Amber Heard had no bruising on her face days after Johnny Depp allegedly attacked her in their home, according to US reports.

Amber filed for divorce last month after 15 months of marriage and subsequently claimed the actor had assaulted her during a row on May 21.

The concierges in the pair's building claim there didn't appear to be any evidence of facial bruising when they saw the actress on Monday, two days after the alleged incident, reports TMZ.

The website says a lawyer who lives in the building was told by a concierge that her face looked so flawless, "I was about to compliment her on her complexion

#AmberHeard

Amber heard was born and raised in Texas. In adolescence, the future actress actively participated in school theater productions, starred in commercials and was involved in advertising and political campaigns.

When amber was 16 her best friend died in a car crash. Then Hurd, still a staunch Catholic, declared herself an atheist. At 17 she left the Catholic Academy of St. Michael and went to new York where he began working as a model. Such a profession, however, didn't appeal to her, and soon she went to Los Angeles in pursuit of a dream — a career actress.

In Los Angeles heard has appeared in numerous television series: in the pilot episode of "Jack and Bobby" in a role of Liz (2004), in the series "the Mountain" (2004) the role of Riley in "OS — Lonely hearts", where amber was short and vivid the role of the girl-saleswomen.

In the same 2004, heard starred in the movie "glory", playing the role of Mary. Then there was the role of Shay in "Drug ghoul", low-budget horror film, as well as supporting roles in the films "Deadly sexy" (2005), "Price to Pay" and "Here and now" (2006).

Russian viewers actress familiar for her role as Alma in "alpha Dog" in this film, as in "North country," her party was more significant.

Then amber was invited to appear in the series "palm springs" ("Hidden Palms" in the original) in the role of Greta Matthews, who loses his mother and beloved and becomes friends with the main antihero of the series johnny.

To get this role, amber had to lose weight in 4 months strict diet she lost 11 pounds.

In the end, the series aired CW Network, however, of the 12 episodes, viewers saw only 8; then the show was interrupted without explanation.

The next project, the actress became the horror film "All the boys love Mandy lane, where she played the main role. The film premiered at the Toronto film festival, but in British cinemas the film was shown only in a year.

In 2007, the actress starred in the short movie Day 73 with Sarah" and then in the film "Daze". In 2008 starred in the Comedy "Pineapple Express" and sports drama "Never give up". The role fell in love with the main character girl in the box-office the film brought the actress not only money, but also a significant increase in popularity.

In 2008, amber starred in the film "Whistleblowers". At the end of 2008 the actress starred in the films "the River," and "the Joneses". Then there was the movie "Welcome to Zombilend" (2009; amber is playing a small role of the object of passion of hero Jesse Eisenberg, unexpectedly turned into a zombie), horror film "the Stepfather" and the Comedy "out of sight, out of mind".

In 2010, amber played in the movie "the Chamber" by John carpenter and "And darkness comes," and in 2011 "the Rum diary", starring johnny Depp.
